  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      This method calls the other methods of the program, saves some variables that the program needs to use constantly, and declare the Scanner.
      pre: give the other methods all the parameters they need.
      post: this method will make the program runs.
      Parameters:
      args - [], this parameter must have args that the program understands. args!=null

    • diferentMaterialsToBuy

      public static int diferentMaterialsToBuy​(java.util.Scanner input)
      This asks the user how many materials are in the list.
      pre: the user needs to have a list with materials, and type an int.
      post: this method will let the program knows how many diferent materials are in the list.
      Parameters:
      input - has to be declarated before.
      Returns:
      an int with the total of materials in the list.

    • ubication

      public static int ubication​(java.util.Scanner input)
      This asks the user the ubication of the place.
      pre: the user needs to have a list with materials, and type an int.
      post: this method will let the program knows the ubication to calculate the delivery cost.
      Parameters:
      input - has to be declarated before.
      Returns:
      an int with the ubication.

    • thingsToBuy

      public static java.lang.String[] thingsToBuy​(int diferentMaterials, java.util.Scanner input)
      This asks the user the name of each material in the list.
      pre: the user needs to have a list with all the materials.
      post: this method will let the program knows the names of all the materials and use it later, and asks for them.
      Parameters:
      diferentMaterials - has to be declarated and inicializated before.
      input - has to be declarated before.
      Returns:
      an String array with the names of the materials : names[].

    • amountToBuy

      public static int[] amountToBuy​(java.util.Scanner input, java.lang.String[] names, int diferentMaterials)
      This asks the user the amount to buy of each material in the list.
      pre: the user needs to have a list with all the materials and their amount.
      post: this method will let the program knows the amount of all the materials and use it later, and ask for the names of them.
      Parameters:
      input - has to be declarated before.
      names - has to be filled. names != null ^^ names!=""
      diferentMaterials - has to be declarated and inicializated before.
      Returns:
      an int array with the names of the materials : amountToBuy[].

    • totalCost

      public static int[] totalCost​(int diferentMaterials, java.lang.String[] materials, java.util.Scanner input, int[] amountToBuy, java.lang.String shopName, int deliveryCost)
      This asks the user the name of each material in the list.
      pre: the user needs to have a list with all the materials.
      post: this method will let the program knows the unitary cost to use it later.
      Parameters:
      diferentMaterials - has to be declarated and inicializated before. diferentMaterials>0
      materials - has to be filled. materials != null ^^ materials !=""
      input - has to be declarated before. input !=null
      amountToBuy - has to be declarated and inicializated with the amount to buy of all the materials.
      shopName - has to be write in the program, because it's not a variable. shopName != ""
      deliveryCost - has to be inicializated and declarated. deliveryCost != null
      Returns:
      an int array with the unitary cost of the materials : unitaryCost[].

    • displayMaterialsByUse

      public static void displayMaterialsByUse​(java.lang.String[] names, int diferentMaterials, java.util.Scanner input, int[] totalAndBestShop)
      This method displays the materials that are going to be used in the process that the user choosed.
      pre: The user has to call this method in the main method.
      post: this method will let the user know wich materials are going to be used in the process he choosed.
      Parameters:
      names - , names 2 has to be declarated and inicializated with all the names. []names2 !=null
      diferentMaterials - has to be declarated and inicializated before. diferentMaterials>0
      input - has to be declarated before. input !=null
      totalAndBestShop - has to be filled. totalAndBestShop != null ^^ totalAndBestShop>0

    • showBestShopForMaterials

      public static void showBestShopForMaterials​(int[] totalAndBestShop, java.lang.String[] material, int[] firstValue, int[] secondValue, int[] thirdValue, int diferentMaterials)
      This method will show the user wich shop has the best prices for each material.
      pre: the user needs to have a list with all the materials.
      post: this method will let the program knows the unitary cost to use it later.
      Parameters:
      totalAndBestShop - , this method must be filled before with values biggers than zero. [] totalAndBestShop > 0.
      material - has to be filled. material!=null ^^ material!=""
      firstValue - , has to be declarated, inicializated, and filled with int values biggers than zero. []firstValue != null ^^ []firstValue>0
      secondValue - , has to be declarated, inicializated, and filled with int values biggers than zero. []secondValue != null ^^ []secondValue>0
      thirdValue - , has to be declarated, inicializated, and filled with int values biggers than zero. []thirdValue != null ^^ []thirdValue>0
      diferentMaterials - has to be declarated and inicializated before. diferentMaterials>0
